name: UNSUBSCRIBED: THE GAME
description: UNSUBSCRIBED is a 2019 Canadian 'found footage comedy horror' game made by Alain Lagace (BMC Studio) The game is a live action interactive story. It features Goodigo (Twitch Streamer), Undead unicorn (Voice in Sexy Comedy), Galaxy Goober (Voice in Jekoos) and Mr Despicable (Actor in Real Life Battle Royal) as friends in an online video chat that is taken possesion by Steve's (Undead unicorn) brother (Alain Lagacé) because they didn't subscribe to his MyTube channel.
